Class LdMatrixComputerRunnable

    Runnable for the LD matrix writer.
    Author:
    Marc Vaudel

    • Constructor Detail

      • LdMatrixComputerRunnable

        public LdMatrixComputerRunnable(LdMatrixWriter writer,
                                WindowGenotypesIterator iterator,
                                ChildToParentMap childToParentMap,
                                int maxDistance,
                                double minR2,
                                boolean hardCalls,
                                VariantIndex variantIndex,
                                boolean testIteration,
                                SimpleCliLogger logger)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        writer - The writer to use.
        iterator - The variant iterator.
        childToParentMap - The map of trios.
        maxDistance - The maximal number of bp to allow between variants.
        minR2 - The minimal ld r2 to report (inclusive).
        hardCalls - Boolean indicating whether hard calls should be used instead of dosages.
        variantIndex - The index to use for the variants.
        testIteration - Boolean indicating whether the runnable should only iterate through the variants and not compute LD calculations.
        logger - The logger.
